original_text: So Moses listened to the voice of his father-in-law and did all that he had said.
korean_text: 이에 모세가 자기 장인의 말을 듣고 그 모든 말대로 하여

sentences.original_text: So Moses listened to the voice of his father-in-law
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 그의 장인의 말을 들었고

sentences.original_text: and did all that he had said
